title: i need some rp
body: I want some rp that I can buy skin can I ?   I need 43 rp to buy a skin thanks

replies.body: Dude, put in a Microsoft paint drawing

I'm unable to assist you with this request here on *Help & Support*, but if you reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or on Twitter [**@RiotSupport**](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor), we'll be happy to help!

If you have any other questions, let me know!
